attributes.comment:
IN REGARDS TO THE FEE INCREASED, I BELEIVED IS UNFAIR, DUE TO THE FACT THAT DHS
KNOWS THAT AN IMMIGRANT WILL PAY WHAT EVER INCREASED WILL BE IN EFFECT. SINCE
THEY HAVE TO EITHER IMMIGRATE THEIR FAMILY MEMBER OR BECOME A USC. ONE OF THE
COMMENTS GIVEN BY THE PUBLIC STATES THAT IMMIGRANTS SHOULD PAY NOT THE TAX
PAYER, WELL TO THAT PERSON SHOULD KNOW THAT IMMIGRANTS ARE ALSO TAX PAYERS EVEN
NON-IMMIGRANTS WHO IN FACT CONTRIBUTE TO TAX AND ARE NOT AWARDED REFUNDS. IN
THAT CASE IMMIGRANTS AND NON-IMMIGRANTS SOMETIMES PAY EVEN MORE. AS A U.S.
CITIZEN I DECLINE TO ACCEPT THE INCREASE OF SUCH FEE, BUT WE NEED TO STOP LYING
TO OUR SELF. THE GOV. SET THEIR MINDS TO INCREASE THE FEE WHY EVEN BOTHER TO
REQUEST THE COMMENT OF THE PUBLIC SINCE THEY WILL NOT DO ANYTHING WITH IT.
attributes.title: Comment Submitted By Concerned Citizen
